date.SpeakText: 嘿，小勇士，你是我引导的第8434个来这里探险的人。
date.SpeakText_EN: I knew you would come! Just call it intuition.The choice is yours.

date.SpeakText: 我的家乡在遥远的国度斯巴鲁，那里有会变魔术的小丑，你从哪里来？
date.SpeakText_EN: We are amidst strange beings, in a strange land.

date.SpeakText: 什么？你问我哪边是南边，我要是能告诉你我也就不会走丢了...
date.SpeakText_EN: I'm getting a little dizzy。

date.SpeakText: 嗐！我在这里生活了几十年，没见过有谁一次就能打败狼王，你可悠着点吧。
date.SpeakText_EN: I can't recall the taste of food, nor the sound of water, nor the touch of grass…I can only see the Wolf king… with my waking eyes

date.SpeakText: 不，我不想和你一起去葬送性命，我老婆在家等我吃饭...
date.SpeakText_EN: I am blessed to have found such a brave companion!

date.SpeakText: 看你的背包鼓囊囊的，分我一点食物吧，我几天没吃东西了。
date.SpeakText_EN: I wander alone.

date.SpeakText: 你会游泳吗，不会游就不要去海底了。
date.SpeakText_EN: ..I beg of thee...the spread of the Abyss......it must be stopped...

date.SpeakText: 海底世界有很多宝物，不过我不会告诉你它们就藏在那个大贝壳里。
date.SpeakText_EN: Would you like to feel the ocean spray in your face? Fu~

date.SpeakText: 告诉你一个大秘密，海底领主其实是一条美人鱼。
date.SpeakText_EN: Captain Thore on duty

date.SpeakText: 你问我的工作有什么乐趣？我每天都在这里看鱼游来游去。
date.SpeakText_EN: Now ，you are on 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea

date.SpeakText: 这里是圣光大陆最炎热的地方，来一趟你就会晒黑到能和黑夜融为一体了。
date.SpeakText_EN: This place is hotter than Las Vegas

date.SpeakText: 你也是来这里探险的勇士？或许我们可以结伴而行，当然你也要把你的食物分我一半。
date.SpeakText_EN: Broken bones get stronger. ~~Rrrrggg! I think I have a splinter

date.SpeakText: 出售秘密：600金币一条
date.SpeakText_EN: Every secret can be unearthed.If you give me 300 ，no 600 gold pieces!

date.SpeakText: 最近营地里晚上总是能看见红色的亮光，他们说那是鬼火，真叫人害怕。
date.SpeakText_EN: Light from the darkness, darkness emergent light.?

date.SpeakText: 去，别打扰我唱歌，我的歌声赛过百灵鸟
date.SpeakText_EN: Please, allow me a moment alone.~~...Ohh, ohhh…

date.SpeakText: 千万不要吃那些蘑菇！吃了就会变成蘑菇人！
date.SpeakText_EN: I refuse to be a slave to this torment.Don't eat those mushrooms！

date.SpeakText: 你还想去找塔卢斯？别不自量力了，没人能打得过塔，趁早跟我一起逃走吧
date.SpeakText_EN: It is clear that our loyalty was never truly reciprocated.

date.SpeakText: 你能帮我找到我的灵魂吗？
date.SpeakText_EN: I ..miss my soul.

date.SpeakText: 恶魔大厅不是谁都能进去的地方。
date.SpeakText_EN: ...Whatever thou art, stay away...

date.SpeakText: 你还有什么遗言需要我带给你的家人吗？比如你的保险箱密码是多少之类的。
date.SpeakText_EN: ...For I have availed you nothing..But at least alive.

date.SpeakText: 唔!他们管我叫小仙女,还说我是喝露水长大.我也不知道我为什么来到这里,嗯,就好像... 就好像是在等一个人的到来.
date.SpeakText_EN: Alas, they call me a little fairy, and say that I grew up drinking dew. I don't know why I came here, um, it's like ... It's like waiting for someone to come.

date.SpeakText: 欢迎你，圣光大陆的子民，这里是任务集训地，在这里你每天可以通过做任务来增加经验，当每日任务完成后，便可以得到圣光的庇佑以及你可能想要的某一件装备。祝你好运，我的小勇士。
date.SpeakText_EN: To make each day count.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 小伙子,记得每天来我这里打卡喔！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: To make each day count.

date.SpeakText: 欢迎你，圣光大陆的子民，这里是任务集训地，在这里你每天可以通过做任务来增加经验，当每日任务完成后，便可以得到圣光的庇佑以及你可能想要的某一件装备。祝你好运，我的小勇士。
date.SpeakText_EN: To make each day count.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 小伙子,记得每天来我这里打卡喔！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: To make each day count.

date.SpeakText: 欢迎你，圣光大陆的子民，这里是任务集训地，在这里你每天可以通过做任务来增加经验，当每日任务完成后，便可以得到圣光的庇佑以及你可能想要的某一件装备。祝你好运，我的小勇士。
date.SpeakText_EN: To make each day count.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 小伙子,记得每天来我这里打卡喔！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: To make each day count.

date.SpeakText: 欢迎你，圣光大陆的子民，这里是任务集训地，在这里你每天可以通过做任务来增加经验，当每日任务完成后，便可以得到圣光的庇佑以及你可能想要的某一件装备。祝你好运，我的小勇士。
date.SpeakText_EN: To make each day count.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 小伙子,记得每天来我这里打卡喔！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: To make each day count.

date.SpeakText: 欢迎你，圣光大陆的子民，这里是任务集训地，在这里你每天可以通过做任务来增加经验，当每日任务完成后，便可以得到圣光的庇佑以及你可能想要的某一件装备。祝你好运，我的小勇士。
date.SpeakText_EN: To make each day count.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 小伙子,记得每天来我这里打卡喔！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: To make each day count.

date.SpeakText_EN: It's hammer time!?Yeah, runs on little hammer 40G, big hammer 80G. Whatever it takes.
You'll love my new recipe
It's common sense that the most expensive gemstone goes with the prettiest woman，emm~also strongest man

date.SpeakText: 我这里有许多关于宝藏的秘密,你要不要来听一听？
date.SpeakText_EN: All life is a game of luck

date.SpeakText: 咪咻咪咻~
这里副本藏有最厉害的大魔王,进去的时候务必小心,千万不要惊醒它们！
date.SpeakText_EN: To ask why we fight, is to ask why the leaves fall.?

date.SpeakText: 这里副本藏有最厉害的大魔王,进去的时候务必小心,千万不要惊醒它们！
date.SpeakText_EN: Hmm, a delivery from FedEx Industries...

date.SpeakText: 这里面有许许多多的宝箱！
date.SpeakText_EN: There are many treasure chests in it!

date.SpeakText: 里面的怪物的难度是你无法想象的,或许你可以在这里证明你的能力！
date.SpeakText_EN: Great power comes with great responsibility
I'm not iron man. I can't give you armor

date.SpeakText: 我在这么隐蔽的位置都被你发现了！咳咳！我的任务可是游戏里难度最高的喔！每次完成第20环,第40环,第60环,第80环都会获得一份奖励哦,当完成第100环时,将获得一份丰厚的大礼喔！
date.SpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 你看不见我!你看不见我!你看不见我!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift

date.SpeakText: 我在这么隐蔽的位置都被你发现了！咳咳！我的任务可是游戏里难度最高的喔！每次完成第20环,第40环,第60环,第80环都会获得一份奖励哦,当完成第100环时,将获得一份丰厚的大礼喔！
date.SpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 你看不见我!你看不见我!你看不见我!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift

date.SpeakText: 我在这么隐蔽的位置都被你发现了！咳咳！我的任务可是游戏里难度最高的喔！每次完成第20环,第40环,第60环,第80环都会获得一份奖励哦,当完成第100环时,将获得一份丰厚的大礼喔！
date.SpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 你看不见我!你看不见我!你看不见我!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift

date.SpeakText: 我在这么隐蔽的位置都被你发现了！咳咳！我的任务可是游戏里难度最高的喔！每次完成第20环,第40环,第60环,第80环都会获得一份奖励哦,当完成第100环时,将获得一份丰厚的大礼喔！
date.SpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 你看不见我!你看不见我!你看不见我!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift

date.SpeakText: 我在这么隐蔽的位置都被你发现了！咳咳！我的任务可是游戏里难度最高的喔！每次完成第20环,第40环,第60环,第80环都会获得一份奖励哦,当完成第100环时,将获得一份丰厚的大礼喔！
date.SpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 你看不见我!你看不见我!你看不见我!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: When you complete every 20 tasks, you will receive an extra bonus, and when u complete the 100th task, you will receive a generous gift

date.SpeakText: 你需要在这一堆宝箱中找到真实的宝箱,加油~
date.SpeakText_EN: All life is a game of luck
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 我在这里遇到的第65535个探宝者,祝你有好的运气吧！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: All life is a game of luck

date.SpeakText: 在这里,你可以看到自己的能力,能力越高,获得的回报也就越高喔!
date.SpeakText_EN: Here, you can see your ability. The higher the ability is, the higher the reward will be!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 祝你好运！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: All life is a game of luck

date.SpeakText: 到了60级后可以来我这里领取最终觉醒任务!
能进到这里来都是最强的王者!
在这里,你可以看到自己的能力,能力越高,获得的回报也就越高喔!
date.SpeakText_EN: Here, you can see your ability. The higher the ability is, the higher the reward will be!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 祝你好运！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: All life is a game of luck

date.SpeakText: 每天就在这里原地飞,快无聊死了,小勇士,你是来带我出去玩的嘛？
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 有人要来领养我嘛？
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: I'm still hatching, please don't disturb me, thank you!

date.SpeakText: 外面的世界会是什么样子呢？

date.SpeakText_EN: Got some rare/good things on sale stranger！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 跑啥啊,快来看一看,我这里的东西应有尽有！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Got some rare/good things on sale stranger！

date.SpeakText_EN: Stranger，stranger！Now that's a weapon。

date.SpeakText: 瞧，大人们常说学会归纳整理是一个好习惯。
date.SpeakText_EN: Leave it to me, I take a big weight off your shoulders!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 瞧，大人们常说学会归纳整理是一个好习惯。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Leave it to me, I take a big weight off your shoulders!

date.SpeakText: 你指望你这一堆小玩意儿能炼成什么宝物？
date.SpeakText_EN: Don't worry, the equipment won't break，I'm not DFO-Kiri
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 你指望你这一堆小玩意儿能炼成什么宝物？
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Don't worry, the equipment won't break，I'm not DFO-Kiri

date.SpeakText: 护卫王城是我的职责
date.SpeakText_EN: We guardsmans were fiercely loyal to King.Followed his commands.?
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 护卫王城是我的职责
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: We guardsmans were fiercely loyal to King.Followed his commands.?

date.SpeakText: 为了保护这座王城,我愿意奉献我的一切！
date.SpeakText_EN: Then you shall know our radiance, our duty.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 为了保护这座王城,我愿意奉献我的一切！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Then you shall know our radiance, our duty.

date.SpeakText: 年轻人，我看你的背包鼓囊囊的，拿到我这里来指不定能卖个好价钱！
date.SpeakText_EN: I will reduce all to pieces
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 年轻人，我看你的背包鼓囊囊的，拿到我这里来指不定能卖个好价钱！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: I will reduce all to pieces

date.SpeakText: 嗯，你没听错，我是个碎片收集狂。
date.SpeakText_EN: Ah……I'll buy it at a high price。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 嗯，你没听错，我是个碎片收集狂。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Ah……I'll buy it at a high price。

date.SpeakText: 我没事就喜欢到世界各地去旅游,如果你看到我了,千万不要抓我,我会很害怕的！~
date.SpeakText_EN: After all this searching, you still cannot find me…，mie~mie~haaaaa
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 没错!我就是无处不在的小绵绵!如果你幸运的话,你将在世界各地都能看到我喔~
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: After all this searching, you still cannot find me…，mie~mie~haaaaa

date.SpeakText: 年轻人，我这里说不定可以帮上你的大忙哦!
date.SpeakText_EN: I will reduce all to pieces
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 年轻人，我这里说不定可以帮上你的大忙哦!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: I will reduce all to pieces

date.SpeakText: 隔壁那家店千万别去，他做的都是黑心的买卖！
date.SpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 隔壁那家店千万别去，他做的都是黑心的买卖！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.

date.SpeakText: 我货架上的的都是精品，你就放心购买吧。
date.SpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 我货架上的的都是精品，你就放心购买吧。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.

date.SpeakText: 隔壁那家店千万别去，他做的都是黑心的买卖！
date.SpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 隔壁那家店千万别去，他做的都是黑心的买卖！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.

date.SpeakText: 我货架上的的都是精品，你就放心购买吧。
date.SpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 我货架上的的都是精品，你就放心购买吧。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.

date.SpeakText: 隔壁那家店千万别去，他做的都是黑心的买卖！
date.SpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 隔壁那家店千万别去，他做的都是黑心的买卖！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: You're the lucky one.

date.SpeakText: 喔，我的小可怜，快让我瞧瞧伤到哪里了
date.SpeakText_EN: There are some medicines that will give you a boost，no~no~no ，not little blue pill
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 喔，我的小可怜，快让我瞧瞧伤到哪里了
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: There are some medicines that will give you a boost，no~no~no ，not little blue pill

date.SpeakText: 有些药能让你的实力大增，一般人我可不告诉他。
date.SpeakText_EN: Side affects may include dry mouth, nausea, vomiting, water retention, painful rectal itch, hallucination, dementia, psychosis, coma, death and halitosis.?
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 有些药能让你的实力大增，一般人我可不告诉他。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Side affects may include dry mouth, nausea, vomiting, water retention, painful rectal itch, hallucination, dementia, psychosis, coma, death and halitosis.?

date.SpeakText: 喔，我的小可怜，快让我瞧瞧伤到哪里了
date.SpeakText_EN: There are some medicines that will give you a boost，no~no~no ，not little blue pill
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 喔，我的小可怜，快让我瞧瞧伤到哪里了
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: There are some medicines that will give you a boost，no~no~no ，not little blue pill

date.SpeakText: 卖了这么多年药了，我多少懂一点点医术，你有什么不舒服的地方尽管和我说。
date.SpeakText_EN: Side affects may include dry mouth, nausea, vomiting, water retention, painful rectal itch, hallucination, dementia, psychosis, coma, death and halitosis.?
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 卖了这么多年药了，我多少懂一点点医术，你有什么不舒服的地方尽管和我说。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Side affects may include dry mouth, nausea, vomiting, water retention, painful rectal itch, hallucination, dementia, psychosis, coma, death and halitosis.?

date.SpeakText: 有些药能让你的实力大增，一般人我可不告诉他。
date.SpeakText_EN: Is someone injured?
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 有些药能让你的实力大增，一般人我可不告诉他。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Is someone injured?

date.SpeakText: 我们家世代都以卖宝石为生，到了我这里也不例外。
date.SpeakText_EN: Ahh……A choice of an avid jewelry collector。It's a nice jewelry ，stranger。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 我们家世代都以卖宝石为生，到了我这里也不例外。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Ahh……A choice of an avid jewelry collector。It's a nice jewelry ，stranger。

date.SpeakText: 我最讨厌别人怀疑我的宝石是真是假了！别让我生气。
date.SpeakText_EN: Ahh……A choice of an avid jewelry collector。It's a nice jewelry ，stranger。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 我最讨厌别人怀疑我的宝石是真是假了！别让我生气。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Ahh……A choice of an avid jewelry collector。It's a nice jewelry ，stranger。

date.SpeakText: 你捡到的宝石有些连我都没见过，如果你送我一颗的话，我可以考虑帮你品品是好是坏。
date.SpeakText_EN: Heart of the Sea？I suggest you look for it in chapter 2
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 你捡到的宝石有些连我都没见过，如果你送我一颗的话，我可以考虑帮你品品是好是坏。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Heart of the Sea？I suggest you look for it in chapter 2

date.SpeakText: 我最讨厌别人怀疑我的宝石是真是假了！别让我生气。
date.SpeakText_EN: It's common sense that the most expensive gemstone goes with the prettiest woman，emm~also strongest man
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 我最讨厌别人怀疑我的宝石是真是假了！别让我生气。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: It's common sense that the most expensive gemstone goes with the prettiest woman，emm~also strongest man

date.SpeakText: 我们家世代都以卖宝石为生，到了我这里也不例外。
date.SpeakText_EN: It's common sense that the most expensive gemstone goes with the prettiest woman，emm~also strongest man
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 我们家世代都以卖宝石为生，到了我这里也不例外。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: It's common sense that the most expensive gemstone goes with the prettiest woman，emm~also strongest man

date.SpeakText: 养只小宠物也是不错的选择，至少一个人的时候不会那么孤单。
date.SpeakText_EN: animals are man's best friend
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 养只小宠物也是不错的选择，至少一个人的时候不会那么孤单。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: animals are man's best friend

date.SpeakText: 买只可爱的宠物送给老婆，她一定会开心到亲亲我。
date.SpeakText_EN: Friee anyone??~~oh sry im not talking with you
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 买只可爱的宠物送给老婆，她一定会开心到亲亲我。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Friee anyone??~~oh sry im not talking with you

date.SpeakText: 动物是人类最好的朋友。
date.SpeakText_EN: animals are man's best friend
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 动物是人类最好的朋友。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: animals are man's best friend

date.SpeakText: 买只可爱的宠物送给老婆，她一定会开心到亲亲我。
date.SpeakText_EN: Friee anyone??~~oh sry im not talking with you
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 买只可爱的宠物送给老婆，她一定会开心到亲亲我。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Friee anyone??~~oh sry im not talking with you

date.SpeakText: 养只小宠物也是不错的选择，至少一个人的时候不会那么孤单。
date.SpeakText_EN: animals are man's best friend
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 养只小宠物也是不错的选择，至少一个人的时候不会那么孤单。
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: animals are man's best friend

date.SpeakText: 听说我们这里是圣光大陆最后没有被黑暗吞噬的敌方了
date.SpeakText_EN: Here is the last place in Holy Land that has not been swallowed up by darkness
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 听说我们这里是圣光大陆最后没有被黑暗吞噬的敌方了
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Here is the last place in Holy Land that has not been swallowed up by darkness

date.SpeakText: 今天早饭忘记加火腿了,这一天天的走啊走真是耗体力
date.SpeakText_EN: But soon, the flames will fade, and only Dark will remain.
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 今天早饭忘记加火腿了,这一天天的走啊走真是耗体力
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: But soon, the flames will fade, and only Dark will remain.

date.SpeakText: 我们要一定要保护好这个王城,你们要打气精神,听说最近晚上会有不好的事情发生！
date.SpeakText_EN: This is my kingdom. If I don't fight for it, who will?
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 我们要一定要保护好这个王城,你们要打气精神,听说最近晚上会有不好的事情发生！
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: This is my kingdom. If I don't fight for it, who will?

date.SpeakText: 听说我们这里是圣光大陆最后没有被黑暗吞噬的敌方了
date.SpeakText_EN: But I cannot give up. I became guardsmanto pursue this!
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 听说我们这里是圣光大陆最后没有被黑暗吞噬的敌方了
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: But I cannot give up. I became guardsmanto pursue this!

date.SpeakText: 今天早饭忘记加火腿了,这一天天的走啊走真是耗体力
date.SpeakText_EN: What do you think? Why not join me, as a warrior of the city ?
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 今天早饭忘记加火腿了,这一天天的走啊走真是耗体力
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: What do you think? Why not join me, as a warrior of the city ?

date.SpeakText: 听说我们这里是圣光大陆最后没有被黑暗吞噬的敌方了
date.SpeakText_EN: Patrol consumes energy ，could you give me some bread？ OH，no，no French baguette，tks
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 听说我们这里是圣光大陆最后没有被黑暗吞噬的敌方了
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: Patrol consumes energy ，could you give me some bread？ OH，no，no French baguette，tks

date.SpeakText: 今天早饭忘记加火腿了,这一天天的走啊走真是耗体力
date.SpeakText_EN: hi Put down your weapon！Oh ，sry ，just French baguette! You can go
date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 今天早饭忘记加火腿了,这一天天的走啊走真是耗体力
date.NpcHeadSpeakText_EN: hi Put down your weapon！Oh ，sry ，just French baguette! You can go

date.NpcHeadSpeakText: 快来我这里饲养动物吧！只要你悉心照料,就可以赚很多家园资金。
我这里有很多不错的家园订单和装备附魔,要不要过来看看,小伙子
小伙子,你怎么还没有坐骑啊！
来我这里变个颜色吧
